meanings.definition: A substance or agent that attracts something
meanings.sent1: The sweet smell of the attractant drew the bees to the flowers.
meanings.sent2: The bright colors of the attractant caught the attention of the birds.
meanings.sent3: The attractant was so powerful that even the shyest animals couldn't resist it.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter acted as an attractant, pulling everyone towards her like a magnet.
meanings.sent5: The attractant worked like magic, luring in all kinds of creatures from afar.

meanings.definition: Something that attracts or has the power to attract
meanings.sent1: The shiny object on the ground served as an attractant for the curious child.
meanings.sent2: The attractant in the advertisement made people stop and look at the product.
meanings.sent3: The attractant at the party was the pinata filled with candies.
meanings.sent4: His smile was an attractant that brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The music played by the street performer acted as an attractant for the crowd.
